GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.33 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
mm/memory-failure: disable unpoison once hw error happens

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit fbbc9994641df6a1346c383d29ac7beb9160fbe8, it was introduced in version v2.6.33 by commit 847ce401df392b0704369fd3f75df614ac1414b4. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm/memory-failure: disable unpoison once hw error happens
